segments.text: Peter , how often do you exercise ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I swim and run every day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now , tell me , what do you eat ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't eat any meat , but I do eat fish and eggs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you eat a lot of vegetables ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh yes , and fruit , I love fruit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I never drink alcohol , coffee or tea . They are very bad for you .
segments.speaker: S2
